需要特殊呼叫来激活您的电话服务。按下激活后，按照指示激活您的手机
点击激活以进行特殊呼叫以在您的服务提供商的移动网络上激活您的设备，因此您可进行通话和连接至移动数据网络
如果跳过激活，您将不能拨打电话或连接到移动数据网络(虽然能连接到Wi-Fi网络)。激活手机之前，每次开机都会询问您是否激活
遵循语音指示，直到听到已完成激活
手机正在进行程序化。请稍候
已激活手机。服务可能需要至多15分钟来启动
手机激活失败。您需要找到一个信号更好的区域(靠近窗口或室外)。请重试或拨打客服获得更多选项

记录视频通话前从电脑断开存储连接
Dialing to the T roaming customer center
How to turn Roaming auto dial on or off

[Roaming auto dial]is available while you are roaming. This feature simplifies the dialing process by automatically inserting international call code and Korean country code (82) before a number you entered manually or selected from the phonebook or call log

"You can make calls just as you would in Korea. Enter a number manually or select a number from the phonebook or call log and then select Call Korea. Example: To call 010-1234-5678 from Beijing to Korea, enter 010-1234-5678 (or select the number from phonebook or call log) and then select Call Korea"

"To call within a foreign country: Enter a number manually or select a number from the phonebook or call log and then select Call other countries. Example: To call a Beijing number while in Beijing, enter the number and then select Call other countries. To call another country while outside Korea: Enter the international call code, country code, and the number, and then select Call other countries. You can insert the international call code with a plus sign (press the 0 key) and must remove the first zero from the number. Example: To call 06-1234-5678 from Beijing, China to Osaka, Japan, enter +81-6-1234-5678, and then select Call other countries"
"If you have more questions, please contact the T roaming customer center. Enter 114 with the keypad and select Call Korea to contact the T roaming customer center (+82-2-6343-9000)"
How to turn Roaming auto dial on or off
"You can turn Roaming auto dial on or off. Select T roaming > Roaming auto dial and then select an option: On: turns on Roaming auto dial Off: turns off Roaming auto dial"
How to use the Current local time information service

[Current local time information service] is a free service that gives the local time in another country. To subscribe to this service, call T Roaming customer center. Enter 114 with the keypad and select Call Korea to call the T roaming customer center (+82-2-6343-9000)
Dialing to the MOFAT call center

"This service is supported by Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trades (MOFAT) and provides you with help in the following situations: Lost/Stolen - Contact information for local police station - Passport reissue / Travel certificate issue Injured/Dead - Local hospital information and translation Arrested/Imprisoned - Contact information for Korean embassies - Legal services / Translation Enter 112, 113, or 119 and then select Call Korea to contact the MOFAT call center (+82-2-3210-0404)"
You can set Roaming auto dial on roaming area
You can inform Roaming auto dial on roaming area

A network service that diverts incoming calls to a specified number when you are unable to answer calls, for example when you are on the device or your device is off. You first need to subscribe to the service. Contact customer centre (114+Send) to subscribe or unsubscribe to this service. Enter *72+number to forward calls to+Send to enable, or *720+Send to disable

A network service that diverts all incoming calls and text messages to a specified number. You have to subscribe to this service. You will be charged with monthly fee. Contact the customer centre (114+Send) to subscribe or unsubscribe to this service; enter *71+number to forward calls to+Send to enable, or *710+Send to disable
A free network service that allows you to answer a second call during a call, placing the first call on hold. Enter *40+Send to enable, or *400+Send to disable
